APP_DESCRIPTION.message: Enlarge thumbnails, and show images/videos from links with a mouse hover.

APP_UPDATED.message: The extension just got updated to a new version!

APP_VERSIONINFO.message: Check out the highlights of this release, and/or see the full changelog!

GRNT_HELP.message:
Basic syntax: operator:URL Operators: ! (block), ~ (allow). Start a line with a ; (semicolon) to make it inactive. Use regular expression in URL by duplicating the operator. * (asterisk) any URL. Allow only on imgur !:* ~:http://imgur.com/
Block a few sites !:flickr.com/ !:youtube.com/ !!:^https?://www\.ebay\. !!:^ftp:// On reddit, allow only /r/pics and /r/funny !:http://www.reddit.com/ ~~:^http://www\.reddit\.com/r/(?:pics|funny)/

GRNT_RULEPERLINE.message: Rule per line. For more information click the Details button above.

HZ_ENDIS_TIP.message: Disabled when holding nothing - always enabled. Disabled when holding (key/button) - disabled only when selected key/button is held, otherwise enabled. Enabled when holding nothing - always disabled. Enabled when holding (key/button) - enabled only when the modifier key/button is held, otherwise disabled.

HZ_FULLSPACE_TIP.message:
This option allows the pop-up to be expanded under the mouse cursor, if it doesn't have enough space between the cursor and the side of the page.
If the placement is set to center (previous option), then enabling this has no effect, because in that case the pop-up will always use all the available space.

HZ_FZMODE_TIP.message:
The first mode will always center the image if it's smaller than the screen, otherwise it will proportionally zoom to the part of the image where the cursor is on the screen. Also its position will change as the mouse cursor moves.
In the second mode the position of the image is static, but it can be changed by dragging.

HZ_HIDEIDLECURSOR.message: Hide idle cursor over the pop-up

HZ_HIDEIDLECURSOR_TIP.message: -1 - always visible 0-49 - always hidden >=50 - hide after the specified time (ms)

HZ_HIRESONFZ.message: Load higher resolution when entering full-zoom

HZ_HIRESONFZ_TIP.message: Tries to load the higher resolution of the image when entering full-zoom, if the ratio of the image dimensions (always the longer side divided by the shorter) is greater than or equal to the specified value.

HZ_HIRES_TIP.message:
Many hosts provide different sizes for the same image. The filters are able to create URLs for these images, and mark them as high (usually the original image) and low (mid-sized images, around 800-1024px) resolution.
If this option is un-checked, then by default the low resolution will be shown, but switching between resolutions is possible at any time with the Tab key (or only in full-zoom by clicking on the dimensions in the caption).
If showing image dimensions on caption is enabled, then the color of the dimensions (depending on the style of the caption) will be cyan or red for low resolution, indicating that (maybe) there is a larger image.

HZ_HISTORY.message: Add hovered links to the browser history

HZ_HISTORY_TIP.message: Automatically marks the hovered link as visited when the pop-up becomes visible. In case of albums, at least the first two items must be viewed. It's possible to mark links manually by using the shortcut (see below). If the link is already in the history, then it will be removed. Shift + shortcut key will enable/disable this option on demand.

HZ_MARKONHOVER_TIP.message: When the mouse cursor is moved over a link or thumbnail, then the cursor or the outline of the target will be changed, indicating that there is something to zoom.

HZ_MINPOPUPDISTANCE.message: Minimum distance between the pop-up and the cursor

HZ_PILEWHEEL.message: Scroll through an album with mouse wheel

HZ_PILEWHEEL_TIP.message:
Mouse wheel can be used to step between entries of an album, in addition to shortcuts.
If it's enabled, then it will prevent the page from scrolling while the pop-up is visible.
In full-zoom the default function is zooming for mouse wheel. To use image switching, wheeling must be done in the top-left corner (50x50px) of the screen, or over the counter in caption.

HZ_PRELOAD_TIP.message: no preload - only one image can load at a time minimal - multiple images can load at once, if an image started its loading, it will finish that, even if the mouse cursor leaves the target on mouse over - the image starts to load on mouse over immediately on page-load - all images start to load after the page opened

HZ_SC_CAPTION.message: wrap caption (or hide it when Shift is held)

HZ_SC_COPY.message: Copy URL, or press twice to copy caption-text

HZ_SC_OPEN.message: open image in new tab (Shift for background tab)

HZ_SC_RESET.message: hide the pop-up and stop loading its content

HZ_SC_TOGGLE.message: suspend for the current session and domain

HZ_THUMBASBG.message: Use the thumbnail as the background of the pop-up

HZ_ZOOMRESIZED_TIP.message: This option tells that by how many percent should the original image be larger than its thumbnail version in order to show the pop-up.

OP_ZOOM.message: Ctrl + Right click on an image puts it into a pop-up

SIV_DC.message: Decode the result URL matched by this parameter

SIV_DETAILS.message:
Ctrl + Right click to delete
Drag with left mouse button to move
Shift + Right click to rename (Esc/Enter quits)
Ctrl + Left click to select (multiple select with Shift)

SIV_ERR_DUPENAME.message: Every rule must have a unique name!

SIV_LOOP.message: Loop again the Sieve with the result URL

SIV_UPDALERT.message:
Your custom rules will be preserved only if they're placed before the "dereferers" rule.
Continue?

TLS_SENDTOMSC.message: Ctrl + Alt [+ Shift] + Right click on (normal) image

TRANSLATIONS_TIP.message: If you want to become a translator, then send an e-mail to this address mentioning your spoken languages.
